trans-unit.source: Defines a collection that stores <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Definisce una raccolta che archivia <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> class from an array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref> classe da una matrice di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> objects with which to initialize the new object.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> oggetti con cui inizializzare il nuovo oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> class from another <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref> classe da un altro <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> with which to initialize the new object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref> con cui inizializzare il nuovo oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> with the specified value to the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> con il valore specificato all'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> to add to the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> da aggiungere all'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> at which the new <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> was inserted.
trans-unit.target: L'indice corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref> in corrispondenza del quale il nuovo <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> è stato inserito.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of an array of type <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> to the end of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Copia gli elementi della matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> alla fine dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The array of type <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> containing the objects to add to the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> contenente gli oggetti da aggiungere all'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The value parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> to the end of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Copia gli elementi dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref> alla fine dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> containing the objects to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref> contenente gli oggetti da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The value parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> contains the specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref> contiene l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> to locate.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> da individuare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> is contained in this collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> è contenuto nella raccolta; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> values in the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> to a one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> instance at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Copie di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> valori nell'oggetto <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref> unidimensionale <xref:System.Array>istanza in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the values copied from <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto unidimensionale <xref:System.Array>che rappresenta la destinazione dei valori copiati dal <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The index into `array` to begin copying.
trans-unit.target: Indice in `array` ha inizio la copia.

trans-unit.source: The array parameter is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: Il array parametro è multidimensionale.

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of elements in the is greater than the available space between arrayIndex and the end of array.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - il numero di elementi di è maggiore dello spazio disponibile tra arrayIndex e la fine di array .

trans-unit.source: The array parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The array parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The arrayIndex parameter is less than the array parameter's lower bound.
trans-unit.target: Il arrayIndex parametro è minore di array limite inferiore del parametro.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un enumeratore che può scorrere il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator of the subelements of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> you can use to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Un enumeratore dei sottoelementi di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref> è possibile utilizzare per scorrere la raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Builds a hash value based on all values contained in the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Compilazioni di un valore hash basato su tutti i valori contenuti nell'oggetto <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A hash value based on all values contained in the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un valore hash basato su tutti i valori contenuti nell'oggetto <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the specified <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> in the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'indice dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> nell'attuale <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> to locate.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> da individuare.

trans-unit.source: The index of the specified by the value parameter in the , if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del specificato dal value parametro il , se presente; in caso contrario, -1.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> in corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index where `value` should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero in cui `value` deve essere inserito.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> to insert.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> da inserire.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the entry at the specified index of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la voce in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the entry to locate in the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero della voce da individuare nell'oggetto <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> at the specified index of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index parameter is outside the valid range of indexes for the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il index parametro non è compreso nell'intervallo valido di indici per la raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Removes a specific <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> from the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove un oggetto specifico <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> dall'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"></xref> to remove from the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate"> </xref> da rimuovere dall'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509CertificateCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified by the value parameter is not found in the current .
trans-unit.target: Il specificato per il value parametro non viene trovato nell'oggetto .
